review: So far, here's what I can say about my Fire TV Stick: A) I'm glad I got it when it was offered for like $19 to Prime members and B) it has 't left its box.I travel A LOT for work and bought this to save me from having to chain the laptop to the hotel TV with the HDMI cable...and yes, I understood that captive internet portal support was "coming."Geezus - how long does it take to work in some kind of lightweight browser, on what is essentially an Android device, so that you can use it with captive portal internet?  Too long, apparently...so, here I am four months after I've purchased it and it is yet to be unboxed...because Amazon hasn't solved this little conundrum.  I don't need the device at home - I'm running a Tivo spread which supports Amazon just fine.  Several Kindle Fires lurk in my house too.  The stick sits. And waits....
